availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander T. McElroy (Caldwell County, Kentucky. Shoe and boot maker)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, shoe and boot maker. Kentucky native. Son of Jonathan M. McElroy and Catherine McElroy. Married to Clarinda A. Copeland McElroy in Princeton, Kentucky, on January 28, 1865. Laborer in Caldwell County in 1850. Shoe and boot maker in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 313B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Freedonia Subdivision, p. 161.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, District 1, p. 20B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film 000546374, p 275.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Caldwell County Administration Bonds,1830-1869; Vol 19-20, 1970-1975, p. 471 of Microfilm, (accessed via Ancestry.com on February 21, 2021).
